file.name: subscriptions.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /preapproval:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: "#/tags/subscriptions"
      summary: Create a subscription
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create a subscription
        spa: Crear suscripción
        por: Criar assinatura
      description: A subscription is the union between a plan and a customer. The main characteristic of this contract is that it has a configured a payment method and is the basis for creating the invoices. You can also create a subscription without a plan
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: A subscription is the union between a plan and a customer. The main characteristic of this contract is that it has a configured a payment method and is the basis for creating the invoices. You can also create a subscription without a plan
        spa: Una suscripción es la unión entre un plan y un cliente. La principal característica de este contrato es que tiene configurada una forma de pago y es la base para la creación de las facturas. También puedes crear una suscripción sin un plan
        por: Uma assinatura é a união entre um plano e um cliente. Sua característica principal é ter um meio de pagamento configurado que servirá como base para criar faturas. Também é possível criar assinaturas sem plano
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                preapproval_plan_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Unique subscription plan identifier. This is an optional field. Our model supports creating subscriptions with or without a plan. If you create a subscription with plan we will take the recurring settings from the plan to create the subscription. When you edit the plan we will update the subscriptions. Decide your best model depending on your business.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Unique subscription plan identifier. This is an optional field. Our model supports creating subscriptions with or without a plan. If you create a subscription with plan we will take the recurring settings from the plan to create the subscription. When you edit the plan we will update the subscriptions. Decide your best model depending on your business.
                    spa: Identificador único del plan de suscripción. Este campo es opcional. Nuestro modelo soporta la creación de suscripciones con o sin plan asociado. Si creas una suscripción con un plan, tomaremos la configuración recurrente del plan para crear la suscripción. Cuando edites el plan, actualizaremos las suscripciones. Decide tu mejor modelo en función de tu negocio.
                    por: Identificador único do plano de assinatura. Este é um campo opcional. Nosso modelo suporta a criação de assinaturas com ou sem plano associado. Se você criar uma assinatura com plano, usaremos as configurações recorrentes do plano para criar a assinatura. Quando você editar o plano, atualizaremos as assinaturas. Escolha o melhor modelo dependendo do seu negócio.
                  example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                reason:
                  type: string
                  description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                    spa: Es una breve descripción que el suscriptor verá durante el proceso de checkout y en las notificaciones. Solo se requiere para suscripciones sin plan asociado.
                    por: É uma breve descrição que o assinante verá durante o processo de checkout e nas notificações. É obrigatório apenas para assinaturas sem plano associado.
                  example: Yoga classes
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                    spa: Referencia para sincronizar con tu sistema. Este es un campo de texto libre para ayudarte con tu integración, para vincular las entidades. Solo se requiere para suscripciones sin plan asociado.
                    por: Referência para sincronizar com seu sistema. Este é um campo de texto livre que ajudará na integração com as entidades. Este campo é obrigatório apenas para assinaturas sem plano associado.
                  example: YG-1234
                payer_email:
                  required: true
                  type: string
                  description: To create a subscription it is necessary to link it with an email. Then you will get a unique identifier to identify the subscriber.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: To create a subscription it is necessary to link it with an email. Then you will get a unique identifier to identify the subscriber.
                    spa: Para crear una suscripción es necesario vincularla con un correo electrónico. Luego obtendrás un identificador único para identificar al suscriptor.
                    por: Para criar uma assinatura, é necessário associá-la a um e-mail. Feito isso, você terá acesso a um identificador único para identificar o assinante.
                  example: test_user@testuser.com
                card_token_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Unique card token identifier 
                  example: e3ed6f098462036dd2cbabe314b9de2a
                auto_recurring:
                  type: object
                  description: Configuration data for recurrence It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Configuration data for recurrence It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                    spa: Datos de configuración para recurrencia. Solo se requiere para suscripciones sin plan asociado.
                    por: Configuração de recorrência. É obrigatório apenas para assinaturas sem plano associado.
                  properties:
                    frequency:
                      required: true
                      type: number
                      description: Indicates the frequency value. Along with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Indicates the frequency value. Along with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        spa: Indica el valor de la frecuencia. Junto con frequency_type definen el ciclo de facturación que tendrá una suscripción.
                        por: Indica o valor de frequência. Junto com o frequency_type, define o ciclo de faturamento que uma assinaturá terá.
                      example: 1
                    frequency_type:
                      required: true
                      type: string
                      description: Indicates the type of frequency. Along with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Indicates the type of frequency. Along with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        spa: Indica el tipo de frecuencia. Junto con frequency definen el ciclo de facturación que tendrá una suscripción.
                        por: Indica o valor de frequência. Junto com o frequency, define o ciclo de faturamento que uma assinaturá terá.
                      example: months
                      enum:
                        - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                        - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                    start_date:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                        spa: Fecha a partir de la cual la suscripción estará activa y se empiezan a cobrar las facturas.
                        por: Data que indica o momento em que a assinatura será ativada e começará a cobrança das faturas.
                      example: "2020-06-02T13:07:14.260Z"
                    end_date:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                        spa: Fecha hasta la cual la suscripción estará activa y se dejan de cobrar las facturas.
                        por: Data que indica o fim da assinatura e o momento em que a cobrança não será mais realizada.
                      example: "2022-07-20T15:59:52.581Z"
                    transaction_amount:
                      type: number
                      description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                        spa: Suma que se cobrará en cada factura.
                        por: Valor que será cobrado em cada fatura.
                      example: 10
                    currency_id:
                      required: true
                      type: string
                      description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                        spa: Identificador de la moneda utilizada en el pago
                        por: Identificador da moeda utilizada no pagamento
                      example: ARS
                      enum:
                        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                        - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                        - COP -- Colombian peso.
                        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                back_url:
                  required: true
                  type: string
                  description: Successful return url. Use this setting to redirect your customers  to your site after our checkout. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Successful return url. Use this setting to redirect your customers  to your site after our checkout. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                    spa: URL de retorno exitosa. Usa esta configuración para redirigir a tus clientes a tu sitio después de nuestro checkout. Solo se requiere para suscripciones sin plan asociado.
                    por: URL de retorno de sucesso. Use esta configuração para redirecionar o cliente para seu site após o checkout. É obrigatório apenas para assinaturas sem plano associado.
                  example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: When you create a subscription, you can make it pending or authorized. Authorized status requires you to indicate a payment method. A pending subscription is waiting for a payment method, that the customer can load into our checkout or by your integration tokenizing a card and adding it to the subscription.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: When you create a subscription, you can make it pending or authorized. Authorized status requires you to indicate a payment method. A pending subscription is waiting for a payment method, that the customer can load into our checkout or by your integration tokenizing a card and adding it to the subscription.
                    spa: Cuando creas una suscripción, puedes dejarla pending o authorized. El estado authorized requiere que indiques un método de pago. Una suscripción pending está esperando un método de pago, que el cliente puede cargar en nuestro checkout o mediante tu integración tokenizando una tarjeta y agregándola a la suscripción.
                    por: Quando você cria uma assinatura, pode fazê-la com pagamento pending ou authorized. Status Authorized requer que você indique um meio de pagamento. Uma assinatura com pagamento pending fica aguardando por um meio de pagamento, até que o cliente acesse o checkout ou através da integtração tokenizando um cartão e adicionando-o à assinatura.
                  example: authorized
                  enum:
                    - pending -- Subscription without a payment method
                    - authorized -- Subscription with a payment method
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: Unique subscription identifier.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique subscription identifier.
                      spa: Identificador único de suscripción.
                      por: Identificador único de assinatura
                  version:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: How many times the subscription was modified.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: How many times the subscription was modified.
                      spa: Cantidad de veces que esta suscripción fue modificada.
                      por: Quantas vezes a assinatura foi modificada
                  application_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 1234567812345678
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your application/integration. One of the keys in the pair that make up the credentials that identify an application/integration in your account.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique ID that identifies your application/integration. One of the keys in the pair that make up the credentials that identify an application/integration in your account.
                      spa: ID único que identifica tu aplicación/integración. Una de las claves del par que componen las credenciales que identifican una aplicación/integración en tu cuenta.
                      por: ID único que identifica sua aplicação/integração. Uma das chaves do par que compõe as credenciais que identifica uma aplicação/integração na sua conta.
                  collector_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 100200300
                    description: Unique ID that identifies your user as a seller. This ID matches your User ID in our ecosystem.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique ID that identifies your user as a seller. This ID matches your User ID in our ecosystem.
                      spa: ID único que identifica a tu usuario como vendedor. Este ID coincide con tu User ID en nuestro ecosistema.
                      por: ID único que identifica seu usuário como vendedor. Este ID corresponde ao seu User ID em nosso ecossistema. 
                  preapproval_plan_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Unique plan identifier.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique plan identifier.
                      spa: Identificador único del plan.
                      por: Identificador único do plano.
                    example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                  reason:
                    type: string
                    example: Yoga classes.
                    description: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: It is a short description that the subscriber will see during the checkout process and in the notifications. It is only required for subscriptions without a plan.
                      spa: Es una breve descripción que el suscriptor verá durante el proceso de checkout y en las notificaciones. Solo se requiere para suscripciones sin plan asociado.
                      por: É uma breve descrição que o assinante verá durante o processo de checkout e nas notificações. É obrigatório apenas para assinaturas sem plano associado.
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: 23546246234
                    description: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Reference to sync with your system. This is a free text field to help you with your integration to link the entities.
                      spa: Referencia para sincronizar con tu sistema. Este es un campo de texto libre para ayudarte con tu integración para vincular las entidades.
                      por: Referência para sincronizar com seu sistema. Este é um campo de texto livre para ajudar com a integração para vincular as entidades.
                  back_url:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar
                    description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                      spa: URL de retorno exitosa. Use esta configuración para redirigir a tus clientes a su sitio después de nuestro checkout.
                      por: URL de retorno de sucesso. Use esta configuração para redirecionar seus clientes para o seu site após o checkout.
                  init_point:
                    type: string
                    example: https://www.mercadopago.com.ar/subscriptions/checkout?preapproval_id=2c938084726fca480172750000000000
                    description: URL to checkout to add or modify payment method.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: URL to checkout to add or modify payment method.
                      spa: URL al checkout para agregar o modificar el método de pago.
                      por: URL para o checkout para adicionar ou modificar um meio de pagamento.
                  auto_recurring:
                    type: object
                    description: Configuration data for recurrence.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Configuration data for recurrence.
                      spa: Información de configuración para la recurrencia.
                      por: Configuração da data para recorrência.
                    properties:
                      frequency:
                        type: number
                        description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                          spa: Indica el valor de la frecuencia. Junto con frequency_type definen el ciclo de facturación que tendrá una suscripción.
                          por: Indica o valor de frequência. Junto com frequency_type define o ciclo de cobrança que a assinaturá terá.
                        example: 1
                      frequency_type:
                        type: string
                        description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                          spa: Indica el tipo de frecuencia. Junto con frequency definen el ciclo de facturación que tendrá una suscripción.
                          por: Indica o tipo de frequência. Junto com frequency, definem o ciclo de cobrança que a assinatura terá.
                        example: months
                        enum:
                          - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                          - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                      start_date:
                        type: string
                        format: date
                        description: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Date from which the subscription will be active and we start collecting invoices.
                          spa: Fecha a partir de la cual la suscripción estará activa y se empiezan a cobrar las facturas.
                          por: Data que indica o momento em que a assinatura será ativada e começará a cobrança das faturas.
                        example: "2020-06-02T13:07:14.260Z"
                      end_date:
                        type: string
                        format: date
                        description: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Date until which the subscription will be active and we will stop charging invoices.
                          spa: Fecha hasta la cual la suscripción estará activa y se dejan de cobrar las facturas.
                          por: Data que indica o fim da assinatura e o momento em que a cobrança não será mais realizada.
                        example: "2022-07-20T15:59:52.581Z"
                      currency_id:
                        type: string
                        description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: ID of the currency used in the payment.
                          spa: Identificador de la moneda utilizada en el pago
                          por: Identificador da moeda utilizada no pagamento
                        example: ARS
                        enum:
                          - ARS -- Argentine peso.
                          - BRL -- Brazilian real.
                          - CLP -- Chilean peso.
                          - MXN -- Mexican peso.
                          - COP -- Colombian peso.
                          - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
                          - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
                      transaction_amount:
                        type: number
                        description: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Amount we will charge on each invoice.
                          spa: Suma que se cobrará en cada factura.
                          por: Valor que será cobrado em cada fatura.
                        example: 10
                      free_trial:
                        type: object
                        description: Free trial data.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Free trial data.
                          spa: Información sobre prueba gratuita.
                          por: Informação de teste grátis
                        properties:
                          frequency:
                            type: number
                            description: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Indicates the frequency value. Together with frequency_type they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                              spa: Indica el valor de la frecuencia. Junto con frequency_type definen el ciclo de facturación que tendrá una suscripción.
                              por: Indica o valor de frequência. Junto com frequency_type define o ciclo de cobrança que a assinaturá terá.
                            example: 1
                          frequency_type:
                            type: string
                            description: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Indicates the type of frequency. Together with frequency they define the invoice cycle that a subscription will have.
                              spa: Indica el tipo de frecuencia. Junto con frequency definen el ciclo de facturación que tendrá una suscripción.
                              por: Indica o tipo de frequência. Junto com frequency, definem o ciclo de cobrança que a assinatura terá.
                            example: months
                            enum:
                              - days -- Indicate a frequency in units of days
                              - months -- Indicate a frequency in units of months
                  payer_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Unique customer identifier. This is created from the email you used to create the subscription.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique customer identifier. This is created from the email you used to create the subscription.
                      spa: Identificador único de cliente. Se crea a partir del correo electrónico que utilizaste para crear la suscripción.
                      por: Identificador único do cliente. É criado a partir do e-mail utilizado para criar a assinatura.
                  card_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Unique identifier to retrieve data from the card used as a payment method.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique identifier to retrieve data from the card used as a payment method.
                      spa: Identificador único para recuperar datos de la tarjeta utilizada como medio de pago.
                      por: Identificador único para recuperar dados do cartão utilizado como meio de pagamento.
                  payment_method_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Payment method configured.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment method configured.
                      spa: Método de pago configurado.
                      por: Meio de pagamento configurado.
                  next_payment_date:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                    description: Date of the next payment debit.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Date of the next payment debit.
                      spa: Fecha del próximo débito.
                      por: Data do próximo débito.
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                    description: Creation date
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Creation date
                      spa: Fecha de creación
                      por: Data de criação
                  last_modified:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-01-01T11:12:25.892-04:00"
                    description: Date of last modification
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Date of last modification
                      spa: Fecha de última modificación.
                      por: Data da última modificação.
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: pending
                    description: Status
                    enum:
                      - pending -- Subscription without a payment method
                      - authorized -- Subscription with a payment method
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Subscriptions are not available for this country yet
                      - 400--Bad-Request--The payment method account money is not available in your country
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Collector and Application cannot be from different countries
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field card_token_id is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field payer_email is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for payer_email, must be a valid email address
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction amount, must be a positive number
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for transaction amount, only two decimals are allowed
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.currency_id
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.end_date, the date must be after today
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.frequency, must be a positive integer
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.frequency_type, valid ones are days, months
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for auto_recurring.start_date, the date must be after today
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid format in auto_recurring.start_date or auto_recurring.end_date
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid value for back_url, must be a valid URL
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field reason has more than 255 characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field reason has unsupported characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.frequency is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.frequency_type is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.transaction_amount is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.currency_id is required
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field auto_recurring.end_date must be after auto_recurring.start_date
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field external_reference has more than 255 characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Field external_reference has unsupported characters
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Already exists a preapproval for user <payer_email> and application <application_id>
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Payer and collector cannot be the same user
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Both payer and collector must be real or test users
                      - 400--Bad-Request--This preapproval cannot be created. The seller does not accept account_money
                      - 400--Bad-Request--This preapproval cannot be created only with payment method account_money
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot operate between different countries
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot create preapproval pending, the feature with account money is disabled for your country.
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot pay an amount lower than min
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Cannot pay an amount greater than max
                      - 400--Bad-Request--You cannot create a preapproval with payment_method in status pending
                      - 400--Bad-Request--You cannot create a new preapproval from a cancelled or inactive template
                      - 400--Bad-Request--The transaction_amount must be the same as preapproval_plan
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Card token was used, please generate new
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Card token was generated without cvv validation
                      - 400--Bad-Request--Invalid request data
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401--Unauthorized--CC_VAL_433 Credit card validation has failed
                      - 401--Unauthorized--Verification of collectors personal data is in process, come back later
                      - 401--Unauthorized--Unauthorized access to resource
                      - 401--Unauthorized--This app cannot create subscriptions without a plan
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 403--Forbidden--The collector does not meet the personal data verification requirements
                      - 403--Forbidden--The caller is not authorized to access this resource
                      - 403--Forbidden--Unauthorized seller for this feature AM_VAL_01
        '500':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error

  /preapproval/export:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: "#/tags/subscriptions"
      summary: Export subscriptions
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Export subscriptions
        spa: Exportar suscripciones
        por: Exportar assinaturas
      description: Downloads a CSV file with all the subscriptions that match the search request
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Downloads a CSV file with all the subscriptions that match the search request
        spa: Descarga un archivo CSV con todas las suscripciones que coinciden con la solicitud de búsqueda
        por: Baixar um arquivo CSV com todas as assinaturas que correspondem a solicitação de busca
      parameters:
        - name: collector_id
          in: path
          required: true
          description: ID of the collector requesting the subscriptions.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: ID of the collector requesting the subscriptions.
            spa: ID del collector que solicita las suscripciones.
            por: ID do collector solicitando a assinatura
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 38524206
        - name: preapproval_plan_id
          in: path
          description: Specifies a Plan ID for filtering results from the export.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Specifies a Plan ID for filtering results from the export.
            spa: Especifica un Plan ID para filtrar los resultados de la exportación.
            por: Especifica um Plan ID para filtrar os resultados da exportação.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 2c938084726fca480172750000000000
        - name: status
          in: path
          description: Specifies a status for filtering results from the export. Can be null, one or more than one.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Specifies a status for filtering results from the export. Can be null, one or more than one.
            spa: Especifica un status para filtrar los resultados exportados. Puede ser null, uno o más de uno.
            por: Especifica um Plan ID para filtrar os resultados da exportação. Pode ser null, um ou mais do que um.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: authorized,cancelled,paused
            enum:
              - pending -- Preapproval without a payment method.
              - authorized -- Preapproval with a valid payment method.
              - paused -- Preapproval with temporally discontinued collection of payments.
              - cancelled -- Preapproval terminated. This is an irreversible state.
        - name: sort
          in: path
          description: Specifies the type of sorting selected to retrieve the subscriptions. You must indicate a field and a sort type with the following format field_name:sort_type.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Specifies the type of sorting selected to retrieve the subscriptions. You must indicate a field and a sort type with the following format field_name:sort_type.
            spa: Especifica el tipo de clasificación seleccionado para recuperar las suscripciones. Debes indicar un campo y un tipo de clasificación con el siguiente formato ield_name:sort_type.
            por: Especifica o tipo de classificação selecionado para recuperar as assinaturas. Você deve indicar um campo e um tipo de classificação com o seguinte formato field_name:sort_type.
          schema:
            type: string
            example: payer_id:asc
            enum:
              - asc - Ascending sort
              - desc - Descending sort
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          headers:
            Content-Disposition:
              schema:
                type: string
              description: the format is `attachment; filename="preapprovals.zip"`
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 2c9380847cc2c422017cc489094f0001
                    description: Unique subscription identifier.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique subscription identifier.
                      spa: Identificador único de suscripción.
                      por: Identificador único de assinatura
                  payer_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 123123123
                    description: Unique customer identifier. This is created from the email you used to create the subscription.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique customer identifier. This is created from the email you used to create the subscription.
                      spa: Identificador único de cliente. Se crea a partir del correo electrónico que utilizaste para crear la suscripción.
                      por: Identificador único do cliente. É criado a partir do e-mail utilizado para criar a assinatura.
                  back_url:
                    required: true
                    type: string
                    description: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Successful return URL. Use this setting to redirect your customers to your site after our checkout.
                      spa: URL de retorno exitosa. Use esta configuración para redirigir a tus clientes a su sitio después de nuestro checkout.
                      por: URL de retorno de sucesso. Use esta configuração para redirecionar seus clientes para o seu site após o checkout.
                    example: https://www.yoursite.com

                      por: ID único que identifica sua aplicação/integração. Uma das chaves do par que compõe as credenciais que identifica uma aplicação/integração na sua conta.

      parameters:

        - name: preapproval_plan_id

            type: string
            example: authorized,cancelled,paused
